This game is addicting... I've played it through twice now and keep going back. I just have to wait long enough so I don't remember the puzzle solutions as I enter the chamber. Definitely something that I'll play again and again...

There's no reason NOT to play this game. Blends first-person, puzzle and adventure games in one and with a good story and solid dose of humor.

The best single player experience since Half Life2.  The co-opt mode is pretty nice also.  I recommend this game to everyone.

特徴的なキャラクターによる漫才デモが聞けるFPSっぽいパズルゲー
私はこれで3D酔いを克服しました！別のゲームですぐ酔ったけど！！！！！

シナリオ上で解くべきパズルは難しすぎず、簡単過ぎない絶妙な難易度になっているのでサクサク進めると思います。
パズルゲームとしての真骨頂を味わうのでしたら是非Workshopのカスタムマップをダウンロードして見てください。
シナリオと同程度の難易度のパズルから恐ろしいまでの鬼畜難易度パズルまで多彩なマップがあなたを待っていますよ
Sehr gutes Spiel. Fand nur leider den Kuchen nicht.
Sehr gutes Spiel mit einer tollen Story und einem super Coop Modus.
Отличная игра. Лучше предшественника. Хорошая локализация на русский язык.

This is honestly a super fun game. You can either enjoy the campaign solo or go through MANY puzzles with friends. I really can't recommend this game enough, and even though I haven't put as many hours as I would like on the PC version, I have put a lot of hours into it on console. 

The great thing about the PC version is the workshop maps, it feels like there are endless levels being created for people to enjoy and be challenged by difficult yet fun puzzles.

Seriously pick this game up with a friend if you haven't already and you'll no doubt have a blast.
Say "Apple."

There is little I can add that hasn't already been written in the last year.  I love the sense of humor and the play mechanics are fantastic.  I only wish that I had friends who owned it for the co-op experience.

I once farted on a sea of whales, and they all burst out into heavenly melody. This game was much like that time.
El mejor juego de 2011 (Y probablemente de la generación)

I loved the first Portal, so once I heard that Valve was releasing a second game I knew that I'd have to save up my pennies and grab the second iteratino eventually. And I can say that if you loved the first Portal, then the second will be just as lovable. Witty dialogue, humorous situations, mind bending puzzles, a decent length of a story mode, challenges to complete, and now a co-op mode that isn't dumbed down from the single-layer (or worse, a dumbed down single-player experience that is only a training mode for online play.)

My only qualm with this game is that if you don't have a robust friends list then a few of the achievements are unattainable (without going all over the place to fora to hopefully find someone that hasn't yet played) but other than that no gripes here.
I really like the game, but I couldn’t find the stupid cake."
One of the most entertaining Co-op experiences I have had in a long time.  Defintely give this a try if you haven't already!

Portal and Portal 2: A 3D Puzzle game that requires thinking (I daresay it's almost educational) while being extremely fun and humorous all the way through. There is no other ultimate villain like GLaDOS in any other game.

Portal 2 has a longer campaign than the first and great multiplayer levels.

So what are you waiting for? isn't it time for you to start thinking with Portals? There will be cake!
Интересная игра, особенно в кооперативе. Очень рекомендую :)

Portal 2 non è solo un gioco, è qualcosa di più. Un'esperienza unica da vivere sia in single player, che in coop con un amico. La passione con cui è stato creato si riflette in tutti i particolari, dalla grafica, al doppiaggio, alla storia; niente è stato lasciato al caso. Imperdibile 10/10
Top Game ohne frage. Liebe die idee und finde die rätsel knifflig und nie langweilig hoffe auf einen weiteren teil :D
recommend

Great, witty game. A bit chaotic storytelling, but it's the gameplay that matters. And the gameplay is far better, more interestesting and varied than in the original. In terms of puzzle complexity and fun factor it makes the first seem like a prototype.
Величайше игра, прошел 3 раза на одном дыхании.

This Game is a Masterpiece. It improves upon all aspects of the first part and takes it into new heights.
Too funny.  Simply too funny.  It helps that it's also tons of fun to play.
Good game. Do get.

Als fester Bestandteil des Testprotokolls, muss ich Ihnen mitteilen, dass dieses Spiel sehr empfelenswert ist. 

Portal 2 ist ein sehr gutes Puzzle-Spiel, mit vielen Geheimnissen und einer schönen Geschichte. Es ist auch sehr Umfangreich. Wem der Umfang des Hauptspiels nicht reicht, der darf sich auch noch einige Zeit mit den von User erstellten Karten beschäfitgen.

Ein weiterer Empfehlenswerter Aspekt ist der Koop-Modus, der ein Zusammenspiel von gleich 2 Portalen erfordert. Ein weiterer Kniff, der mit einem guten Freund auch sehr viel Spaß macht.

Wer Portal 1 schon mochte, der wird auch Portal 2 mögen und quasi eine Fortsetzung der Geschichte erfahren. Wer Portal 1 nicht kennt, der sollte es vorher definitiv erstmal durchspielen.
Sets the bar for sequels sky-high...no not sky-high, MOON HIGH!!!   SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACE
Every bit as funny as the first one and some of the puzzles actually require a little thought.

One of the best games ever made.
The story of the game is absolutely amazing and interesting,with interesting characters and the dialogues between them that are funny and well performed.
The gameplay is simple and brilliant with the best puzzles ever. The portal gun and awesome !
One of the best endings in a video game !
The CO-OP is the best,solving puzzles with a friend is really fun,especially with the workshop which is the reason of the never ending co-op levels.

10/10
good... but where's the cake? ?!

Portal 2 is a worthy successor of the first game. This time there's much more content and Valve introduced characters that make the journey feel a lot more dynamic this time.
What's really different is the approach required for most puzzles. Portal 1 was more of a tricky jump, run and time puzzle while Portal 2 is more about taking the time to discover things in the environment such as a wall or prop that will help  you advance.
Extremely fun game, especially in coop. Now with community map.

love quizes? this is the game for you.

One word: Amazinfantastibrilliant.
Perfect game :D

If you liked Portal, this is must-buy. If you like geniunly cooperative games, this is a must-buy. If you like puzzlegames, this is a must-buy. If you have ANY sense of humour, this is a must-buy. If you like any sort of computergame, this is a must-buy. If you're a complete moron and don't know what's good for you, then this might not be for you!

Awesome game.  A masterpiece from Valve.  If you havent played the first one, I recommed doing so as it will explain some of the events within this one. Singleplayer is great but the CO-OP is quite enjoyable especially with a friend for the "AH HA!" moments.

Look, let's be honest here, there are only two kinds of people out there: People who own Portal 2 and people who hate videogames.

And you don't hate videogames, do you?
